faqDisabled.title: Welcome to the FAQ!
faqDisabled.description:
The FAQ feature is currently disabled.
This feature allows tutors, editors, and instructors to collect and answer frequently asked questions. Students can view these FAQs, which reduces redundant queries and lowers the workload for instructors.
You can enable or disable this feature anytime in the settings.

faq.created: The FAQ {{ title }} was successfully created
faq.updated: The FAQ {{ title }} was successfully updated
faq.proposed: The FAQ {{ title }} was successfully proposed
faq.proposedChange: The changes to the FAQ {{ title }} have been successfully proposed
faq.accepted: The FAQ {{ title }} was successfully accepted
faq.rejected: The FAQ {{ title }} was successfully rejected

delete.question: Are you sure you want to permanently delete the FAQ {{ title }}? This action can NOT be undone!
delete.typeNameToConfirm: Please type in the name of the FAQ to confirm.

faq.noExisting: Currently, there is no FAQ available for this course.
faq.noMatching: There is no FAQ that matches the combination of filter and search criteria.
